title: [JIT][meta] Hybrid front-end example-level robustness testing
body_html:
E2E tests: #8451

Working models:

  • DCGAN example
  • Fast Neural Style Transfer (InstanceNormalization bug #8439)
  • MNIST (partially working, #8448)
  • Reinforcement learning policy network
  • SNLI (runs with external Python calls, #8449 #8450)
  • Super-resolution network
  • Time-sequence prediction (Works with a bunch of hacks)
  • VAE (only runs under eval #8443)

Task tracking:

  • #8439 ONNX InstanceNormalization symbolic interferes with regular tracing
  • #8443 Better support tensor constructors (e.g. zeros, ones) under tracing
  • #8448 ArgumentStash error with mnist example under training
  • #8449 LSTM in the JIT
  • #8450 Dropout in the JIT

Misc:

  • #8453 Generalize checkTrace() to also compare gradients of parameters, not just inputs

Task tracking:

#8443 Better support tensor constructors (e.g. zeros, ones) under tracing
#8448 ArgumentStash error with mnist example under training

Misc:

#8453 Generalize checkTrace() to also compare gradients of parameters, not just inputs
body:
E2E tests: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8451

Working models:

- [x] DCGAN example
- [x] Fast Neural Style Transfer (InstanceNormalization bug #8439)
- [x] MNIST (partially working, #8448)
- [x] Reinforcement learning policy network
- [ ] SNLI (runs with external Python calls, #8449 #8450)
- [x] Super-resolution network
- [x] Time-sequence prediction (Works with a bunch of hacks)
- [x] VAE (only runs under eval #8443)

Task tracking:

- [#8439 ONNX InstanceNormalization symbolic interferes with regular tracing](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8439)
- [#8443 Better support tensor constructors (e.g. zeros, ones) under tracing](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8443)
- [#8448 ArgumentStash error with mnist example under training](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8448)
- [#8449 LSTM in the JIT](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8449)
- [#8450 Dropout in the JIT](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8450)

Misc:
- [#8453 Generalize checkTrace() to also compare gradients of parameters, not just inputs](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/8453)
